title: Set of Rational Numbers
text: The set of rational numbers includes fractions written as $$\frac{m}{n}$$ where $$m$$ and $$n$$ are integers, and $$n$$ does not equal $$0$$.
speech: The set of rational numbers includes fractions written as  m over n,  where  m  and  n  are integers, and  n  does not equal  0 .

title: Set of Irrational Numbers
text: The set of irrational numbers is the set of numbers that are not rational, are nonrepeating, and are nonterminating
